attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After Watching Sky Sports News This Morning and seeing the vt on Bobby Moore about a Posthumous Knighthood. Which is long overdue, For Englands Great Captain,Also a Fitting tribute With The Great Man's Statue outside of Wembley, I Think it would be a great way to repay Bobby Moore and his family.This Man was a True great and a Gentleman, The Golden Boy of English Football.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
